abstract_ssm: Three scrapbooks of clippings, photographs, and a variety of ephemera related to the Western family and Brooklyn events, places, and clubs.  Some national figures and events are also represented.  Materials span the period circa 1880 to 1932.  Henry M. Western was a New York City musician.  He, and later, his daughters, performed at various concerts and cultural events in Brooklyn.
geogname_ssm: Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.) |x Social life and customs
